alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 4:51PM MST until January 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Kamiah, Pullman, Lewiston Grade, Fairfield, Winchester, Lewiston, Nezperce, Ritzville, Tekoa, Downtown Spokane, Moscow, Soldiers Meadow Road, Airway Heights, Culdesac, Uniontown, Post Falls, Davenport, Rockford, Wilbur, Coulee City, Quincy, Coeur d`Alene, Lapwai, Grand Coulee, Colfax, Genesee, La Crosse, Hayden, Cheney, Potlatch, Craigmont, Ephrata, Gifford, Creston, Worley, Othello, Oakesdale, Odessa, Plummer, Moses Lake, Harrington, Peck, Rosalia, and Spokane Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
